document_data.name: Musings on the Realms
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Musings on the Realms''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Oren bel Dannar]], the [[sage]] of [[Triel]]. The year of its publishing was unknown.{{Cite web enhancement/The Leaves of Learning}}{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}{{Cite dragon/272/The New Adventures of Volo: Quotations of the Realms}}

As of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, a copy of the book could be found in both the [[Leaves of Learning]] in [[Highmoon]], and in [[Candlekeep]].
